name: Dr. John Doe
about: Actively involved in medical research and education.
Received multiple awards for contributions to the field.
qualifications: MBBS - Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery

location.about: Medanta - The Medicity Hospital, Gurgaon, founded by Dr.Naresh Trehan, a world-renowned cardiovascular and cardiothoracic surgeon. It is one of India's largest and most reputed Multi-Super Specialty Health Institutes. The hospital holds NABH and NABL accreditations at the National level & JCI, USA accreditations on an International level.

testimonials.name: Aristotles De Almeida
testimonials.testimonial: My son was born with a hearing problem, that’s why we came to India for his treatment, and we are so relieved to be leaving.

testimonials.name: Sabato Dennis
testimonials.testimonial: Medanta Hospital was awesome; I went there for my cardiac treatment, and they treated me very well. Thanks a lot to them.

testimonials.name: Barbier Marie Noelle
testimonials.testimonial: Huge thanks to Medanta Hospital for my wife’s cardiac treatment. My experience with this hospital was very positive.
